# Traitors [color=#999999][italic]"WHISKEY. ECHO. WHISKEY. LIMA. ALPHA. DELTA. AGENT, YOU HAVE BEEN ACTIVATED."[/italic][/color]
Traitors are antagonists employed by the [color=#ff0000]Syndicate[/color]. They are sleeper agents who have access to various [color=#ff0000]Syndicate[/color] tools and weapons through their [color=cyan]uplink[/color]. They can be anyone besides [textlink="Command" link="Command"] and [textlink="Security" link="Security"].
They are also given codewords to identify other agents, and a coordinated team of traitors can take over the station if they play their cards right.
## Uplink The [color=cyan]uplink[/color] is the most important tool for a Traitor, as it can purchase tools and weapons with [color=red]telecrystals[/color] (TC).
20 [color=red]telecrystals[/color] are given to each Traitor, who can share with fellow Traitors. Setting your PDA's ringtone as your special code, which can be found by pressing [color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenCharacterMenu"][/bold][/color], will open the uplink.
Make sure to relock your [color=cyan]PDA[/color] to prevent anyone else from seeing it. You wouldn't want anybody else to get their hands on these sick products!
## Objectives When becoming a Traitor you will have a list of [color=cyan]objectives[/color] ranging from escaping alive, stealing something or killing someone. You can read your objectives by pressing [color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenCharacterMenu"][/bold][/color].
Using your [bold]uplink[/bold] will help you with most of these tasks.
## List of Possible Tasks - Kill or maroon (leave behind) a randomly selected person. - Kill a randomly selected department head. - Keep a randomly selected traitor alive. - Help a randomly selected traitor finish half of their objectives. - Escape to Central Command alive and unrestrained. - Die a glorious death. - Steal the Captain's [color=cyan]ID Card[/color], [color=cyan]antique laser pistol[/color], [color=cyan]jetpack[/color], or [color=cyan]nuclear authentication disk[/color].
- Steal the Chief Medical Officer's [color=cyan]hypospray[/color] or [color=cyan]handheld crew monitor[/color].
- Steal the Research Director's [color=cyan]experimental hardsuit[/color] or [color=cyan]hand teleporter[/color].
- Steal the Head of Security's [color=cyan]secret documents[/color].
- Steal the Chief Engineer's [color=cyan]advanced magboots[/color].
- Steal the Quartermaster's [color=cyan]requisition digi-board[/color].
- Butcher Ian, the Head of Personnel's dog, and obtain [color=cyan]corgi meat[/color].
